nats

Interface NatsFuture<H extends CompletionHandler<?>>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Publication, Request

    public interface NatsFuture<H extends CompletionHandler<?>>
    Represents a pending Nats operation. Most operations in Nats are asynchronous meaning that method invocations will return immediately regardless of whether the operation has completed or not. Instances of this class can be used to track these pending operations and determine if they have completed successfully.

    addCompletionHandler(CompletionHandler)

    can be used to get notified when the pending operation has completed. Alternatively, await() or await(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit) can be used to block the current thread's execution until the operation completes.
    Author:
    Mike Heath

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HandlerRegistration addCompletionHandler(H handler)
      Adds the specified handler to this future.
      void await()
      Waits for the pending operation to complete.
      boolean await(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Waits for the pending operation to complete within the specified time limit.
      Throwable getCause()
      Returns the cause of the failed operation assuming the operation has failed.
      boolean isDone()
      Returns true if and only if the pending operation is complete, regardless of whether the operation completed successfully.
      boolean isSuccess()
      Returns true if and only if the pending operation completed successfully.

    • Method Detail

      • addCompletionHandler

        HandlerRegistration addCompletionHandler(H handler)
        Adds the specified handler to this future. The specified handler is invoked when this future has completed, successful or not. If this future is already completed, the specified listener is invoked immediately.
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler to invoke when this future object has completed
        Returns:
        a handler registration

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        Returns true if and only if the pending operation is complete, regardless of whether the operation completed successfully.
        Returns:
        true if the future has completed, false otherwise

      • isSuccess

        boolean isSuccess()
        Returns true if and only if the pending operation completed successfully.
        Returns:
        true of the future completed successfully, false otherwise.

      • getCause

        Throwable getCause()
        Returns the cause of the failed operation assuming the operation has failed.
        Returns:
        the cause of the failure. null if succeeded or this future is not completed yet.

      • await

        void await()
           throws InterruptedException
        Waits for the pending operation to complete.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the current thread was interrupted

      • await

        boolean await(long timeout,
            TimeUnit unit)
              throws InterruptedException
        Waits for the pending operation to complete within the specified time limit.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the maximum amount of time to wait for the operation to complete
        unit - the unit of the timeout argument
        Returns:
        true if and only if the future was completed within the specified time limit
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the current thread was interrupted
